attributes.action: Vote on changing the government before the normal term has expired
attributes.additional_details: Allow the public to cast a vote to change th3 elected party
attributes.background: I want the government to allow the public to vote and change the elected party before the term ends.   There is a huge divide and distrust with the current party in power that were elected through lies and false promises

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
